items.sentence: Tom told me that he didn't study for the test.
If that were true, it would change everything.
Unfortunately, I don't think Tom will succeed.
Tom obviously wasn't interested in doing that.
I'd rather study French with a native speaker.
Tom couldn't help but tease Mary a little bit.
He doesn't have enough money to go travelling.
I want to go outside and play with my friends.
You'll eventually get the attention you crave.
Tom hopes that no one will ask him to do that.
